chunks.chunk_text: Hello you guys, you are now listening to another special episode of English Cafe歡迎來到每週的英語咖啡館English Cafe喝一杯老師們的本週主題特調一起來探討國際文化時事網路和音樂等多元主題輕鬆吸收主題相關的英語詞彙慣用語和常用粒句喔!Today we welcome Lydia and Caria to join us and tell us a little bit more about the digital space and everything marketing. Welcome!
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.273_ 電商讀英語 - 這年頭的AI軟體到底多可靠研究報告告訴你 Common pitfalls of AI tools.json

chunks.chunk_text: Hello聽眾大家好,我是Caria
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.273_ 電商讀英語 - 這年頭的AI軟體到底多可靠研究報告告訴你 Common pitfalls of AI tools.json

chunks.chunk_text: And AI has been a bigger, even more bigger part of our lives recently, whether you're using it for work, for homework, for any type of job that you're doing, or even for your personal projects, AI is everywhere. And today we're going to touch on this and ask our experts, Caria and Lydia, what they think in the digital space and what we need to actually watch out for in the current AI space.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.273_ 電商讀英語 - 這年頭的AI軟體到底多可靠研究報告告訴你 Common pitfalls of AI tools.json

chunks.chunk_text: So this article that we are referring to, we're going to be discussing today, is related to a digital journalism study that was conducted by the Columbia University's Tau Center. And this comprehensive study is very recent. It was done beginning of this year. And it's about how accurately AI search engines cite news content. So for those of you who use a lot of AI tools, different AI tools out there,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.273_ 電商讀英語 - 這年頭的AI軟體到底多可靠研究報告告訴你 Common pitfalls of AI tools.json

chunks.chunk_text: to source news content or to compile news content for your research or projects that you do, this is the study you need to catch up on, because it tells you a different side of the AI space today. And this research tells us now that AI search tools are one of the biggest alternatives to traditional search engines.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.273_ 電商讀英語 - 這年頭的AI軟體到底多可靠研究報告告訴你 Common pitfalls of AI tools.json

chunks.chunk_text: So this study has done a quick survey of a study of all these AI search engines in the way they search and their accuracy. So a quick rundown of this article too is that they, the methodology of the study.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.273_ 電商讀英語 - 這年頭的AI軟體到底多可靠研究報告告訴你 Common pitfalls of AI tools.json

chunks.chunk_text: What the Columbia University's Tau Center did was they randomly selected 10 articles from 20 different publishers. And when we talk about publishers, we are talking about maybe journals like Time Magazine and Wall Street Journal and CNN, BBC, such, we consider them publishers. And from each article, they manually select direct excerpts. And from these excerpts, they ask AI systems and ask you to identify the corresponding article's headline, the publisher, publication date, and URL.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.273_ 電商讀英語 - 這年頭的AI軟體到底多可靠研究報告告訴你 Common pitfalls of AI tools.json

chunks.chunk_text: And URL referring to the web link. They went through all the AI search engines, ChatGBT, Gemini, Perplexity, and so on. And they conducted 1,600 queries, that is 20 publishers by 10 articles by eight AI systems. So the responses were categorized as correct, incorrect, or correct, but incomplete, partially incorrect, completely incorrect, not provided, or crawler blocked. And the methodology came back
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.273_ 電商讀英語 - 這年頭的AI軟體到底多可靠研究報告告訴你 Common pitfalls of AI tools.json

chunks.chunk_text: with a lot of interesting findings. And we have Keria and Lydia in the house to tell us a little bit more about the study as well as what's happening in the workplace and their use of AI. So to start off, I would like to kick off by saying, Lydia and Keria, which of these AI tools do you guys use right now at work or for your personal projects that I mentioned earlier?
